item.title: Big Buck Bunny
item.description: Big Buck Bunny is a short animated film by the Blender Institute, part of the Blender Foundation.

item.title: Sintel
item.description: Sintel is a fantasy computer generated short movie. It's the third release from the Blender Open Movie Project.

item.title: Elephant's Dream
item.description: Elephant's Dream is the world’s first open movie, made entirely with open source graphics software such as Blender.
